partArray.text: Take a look at your surroundings. You probably only see decrepit bodies and collapsing structures. Even if it horrifies you, try to delve deeper into this reality. Can you perceive it? The ubiquity of the Shape. Buildings as cubes, people as cones, the Sun as a giant sphere. There is a veiled balance in all things, striving towards perfection. The Shape is the world's numen. And if you cultivate this sense of Geometry, you will be closer to reaching the sublime Order of Symmetry.
